===Etymology 1===
The nominalized form of the verb {{m|ja|紅葉つ|tr=momit-}}.

====Pronunciation====

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もみじ}}

===Etymology 2===
/momidi/ → /momizi/. The nominalized form of the verb {{m|ja|紅葉ず|tr=momid-}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[momidʑi]|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もみじ|hhira=もみぢ}}

# colored [[autumn]] leaves
# [[Japanese maple]] (''[[Acer palmatum]]'')
